input:
- name: Sample Ansible playbooks to manage Artificial Intelligence (AI) assistant agents in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: false
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
      rag_api_base_url: '{{ rag_api_base_url }}'
      rag_api_key: '{{ rag_api_key }}'
  tasks:
  - name: Get a list of AI assistant agents in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework "1"
output:
ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
  rag_workspace_id: '{{ rag_workspace_id }}'
  method: LIST
  rag_output_key: '1'
register: get_result

  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: false
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
      rag_api_base_url: '{{ rag_api_base_url }}'
      rag_api_key: '{{ rag_api_key }}'
  tasks:
  - name: Get a list of AI assistant agents into a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) structure
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
      rag_workspace_id: '{{ rag_workspace_id }}'
      method: LIST
    register: get_result
  - name: Display the list of RAG agents
    debug:
      var: get_result.json_payload
  - name: Create an AI assistant agent into a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) structure
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
      rag_workspace_id: '{{ rag_workspace_id }}'
      agent_name: '{{ agent_name }}'
      method: CREATE
    register: create_result
  - name: Display the output of Create a RAG agent
    debug:
      var: create_result.json_payload
  - name: Update an AI assistant agent into a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) structure
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
      rag_workspace_id: '{{ rag_workspace_id }}'
      rag_agent_id: '{{create_result.json_payload.id}}'
      agent_name: '{{ agent_name }}'
      method: UPDATE
    register: update_result
  - name: Display the output of Create an AI assistant agen
    debug:
      var: update_result.json_payload
  - name: Get an AI assistant agen by its ID into a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) structure
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
      rag_workspace_id: '{{ rag_workspace_id }}'
      rag_agent_id: '{{create_result.json_payload.id}}'
      method: GET_BY_ID
    register: get_by_id_result
  - name: Display the agent info
    debug:
      var: get_by_id_result.json_payload
  - name: Delete an AI assistant agen by its ID into a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) structure "290"
output:
ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
  rag_workspace_id: '{{ rag_workspace_id }}'
  rag_agent_id: '{{create_result.json_payload.id}}'
  method: DELETE
  rag_output_key: '290'
register: delete_result

  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: false
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
      rag_api_base_url: '{{ rag_api_base_url }}'
      rag_api_key: '{{ rag_api_key }}'
  tasks:
  - name: Get a list of AI assistant agents in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
      rag_workspace_id: '{{ rag_workspace_id }}'
      method: LIST
    register: get_result
  - name: Display the list of RAG agents
    debug:
      var: get_result.json_payload
  - name: Create an AI assistant agent in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
      rag_workspace_id: '{{ rag_workspace_id }}'
      agent_name: '{{ agent_name }}'
      method: CREATE
    register: create_result
  - name: Display the output of Create a RAG agent
    debug:
      var: create_result.json_payload
  - name: Update an AI assistant agent in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
      rag_workspace_id: '{{ rag_workspace_id }}'
      rag_agent_id: '{{create_result.json_payload.id}}'
      agent_name: '{{ agent_name }}'
      method: UPDATE
    register: update_result
  - name: Display the output of Create an AI assistant agen
    debug:
      var: update_result.json_payload
  - name: Get an AI assistant agen by its ID in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework "364"
output:
ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
  rag_workspace_id: '{{ rag_workspace_id }}'
  rag_agent_id: '{{create_result.json_payload.id}}'
  method: GET_BY_ID
  rag_output_key: '364'
register: get_by_id_result

- name: Sample Ansible playbooks to manage Artificial Intelligence (AI) assistant agents within a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: false
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
      rag_api_base_url: '{{ rag_api_base_url }}'
      rag_api_key: '{{ rag_api_key }}'
  tasks:
  - name: Get a list of AI assistant agents within a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
      rag_workspace_id: '{{ rag_workspace_id }}'
      method: LIST
    register: get_result
  - name: Display the list of RAG agents
    debug:
      var: get_result.json_payload
  - name: Create an AI assistant agent within a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
      rag_workspace_id: '{{ rag_workspace_id }}'
      agent_name: '{{ agent_name }}'
      method: CREATE
    register: create_result
  - name: Display the output of Create a RAG agent
    debug:
      var: create_result.json_payload
  - name: Update an AI assistant agent within a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
      rag_workspace_id: '{{ rag_workspace_id }}'
      rag_agent_id: '{{create_result.json_payload.id}}'
      agent_name: '{{ agent_name }}'
      method: UPDATE
    register: update_result
  - name: Display the output of Create an AI assistant agen
    debug:
      var: update_result.json_payload
  - name: Get an AI assistant agen by its ID within a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
      rag_workspace_id: '{{ rag_workspace_id }}'
      rag_agent_id: '{{create_result.json_payload.id}}'
      method: GET_BY_ID
    register: get_by_id_result
  - name: Display the agent info
    debug:
      var: get_by_id_result.json_payload
  - name: Delete an AI assistant agen by its ID within a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system "1720"
output:
ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
  rag_workspace_id: '{{ rag_workspace_id }}'
  rag_agent_id: '{{create_result.json_payload.id}}'
  method: DELETE
  rag_output_key: '1720'
register: delete_result

  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: false
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
      rag_api_base_url: '{{ rag_api_base_url }}'
      rag_api_key: '{{ rag_api_key }}'
  tasks:
  - name: Get a list of AI assistant agents in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
      rag_workspace_id: '{{ rag_workspace_id }}'
      method: LIST
    register: get_result
  - name: Display the list of RAG agents
    debug:
      var: get_result.json_payload
  - name: Create an AI assistant agent in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework "1847"
output:
ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_agent:
  rag_workspace_id: '{{ rag_workspace_id }}'
  agent_name: '{{ agent_name }}'
  method: CREATE
  rag_output_key: '1847'
register: create_result

  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: false
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
      rag_api_base_url: '{{ rag_api_base_url }}'
      rag_username_api: '{{ rag_username_api }}'
      rag_password_api: '{{ rag_password_api }}'
      rag_api_key: '{{ rag_api_key }}'
  tasks:
  - name: Get a list of documents into a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) structure "803"
output:
ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
  rag_agent_id: '{{ rag_agent_id }}'
  method: LIST
  rag_output_key: '803'
register: get_result

input:
- name: Sample Ansible playbooks to manage documents into a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) structure
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: false
  module_defaults:

  tasks:
  - name: Get a list of documents into a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) structure
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:

  method: GET_BY_ID
  rag_output_key: '804'
register: get_by_id_result

input:
- name: Sample Ansible playbooks to manage documents into a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) structure
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: false
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
      rag_api_base_url: '{{ rag_api_base_url }}'
      rag_username_api: '{{ rag_username_api }}'
      rag_password_api: '{{ rag_password_api }}'
      rag_api_key: '{{ rag_api_key }}'
  tasks:
  - name: Get a list of documents into a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) structure
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
      rag_agent_id: '{{ rag_agent_id }}'
      method: LIST
    register: get_result
  - name: Display the list of RAG documents
    debug:
      var: get_result.json_payload
  - name: Get or Retrieve a document by its ID  into a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) structure
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
      rag_agent_id: '{{ rag_agent_id }}'
      rag_document_id: '{{ get_result.json_payload[0].id  }}'
      method: GET_BY_ID
    register: get_by_id_result
  - name: Display the RAG document info
    debug:
      var: get_by_id_result.json_payload
  - name: Transfer or Submit a document into a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) structure
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
      rag_agent_id: '{{ rag_agent_id }}'
      rag_file_name: Red_Hat_Partner Training_Portal_User_Guide.pdf
      rag_file_url: http://localhost/pdf/Red_Hat_Partner_Training_Portal_User_Guide.pdf
      rag_chunk_overlap: 150
      rag_chunk_size: 400
      rag_keep_files: false
      method: CREATE
    register: create_result
  - name: Display the output of the document ingestion
    debug:
      var: create_result.json_payload
  - pause:
      prompt: Do you want to continue(yes/no)?
    register: my_pause
    delegate_to: localhost
  - name: Remove or Delete a document by its ID into a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) structure "806"
output:
ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
  rag_agent_id: '{{ rag_agent_id }}'
  rag_document_id: '{{ create_result.json_payload.id }}'
  method: DELETE
  rag_output_key: '806'
register: delete_result

  gather_facts: false
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
      rag_api_base_url: '{{ rag_api_base_url }}'
      rag_username_api: '{{ rag_username_api }}'
      rag_password_api: '{{ rag_password_api }}'
      rag_api_key: '{{ rag_api_key }}'
  tasks:
  - name: Get a list of documents within a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
      rag_agent_id: '{{ rag_agent_id }}'
      method: LIST
    register: get_result
  - name: Display the list of RAG documents
    debug:
      var: get_result.json_payload
  - name: Get or Retrieve a document by its ID within a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
      rag_agent_id: '{{ rag_agent_id }}'
      rag_document_id: '{{ get_result.json_payload[0].id  }}'
      method: GET_BY_ID
    register: get_by_id_result
  - name: Display the RAG document info
    debug:
      var: get_by_id_result.json_payload
  - name: Upload a document within a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system "887"
output:
ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
  rag_agent_id: '{{ rag_agent_id }}'
  rag_file_name: Red_Hat_Partner Training_Portal_User_Guide.pdf
  rag_file_url: http://localhost/pdf/Red_Hat_Partner_Training_Portal_User_Guide.pdf
  rag_chunk_overlap: 150
  rag_chunk_size: 400
  rag_keep_files: false
  method: CREATE
  rag_output_key: '887'
register: create_result

input:
- name: Sample Ansible playbooks to manage documents within a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system
  hosts: localhost
  gather_facts: false
  module_defaults:
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
      rag_api_base_url: '{{ rag_api_base_url }}'
      rag_username_api: '{{ rag_username_api }}'
      rag_password_api: '{{ rag_password_api }}'
      rag_api_key: '{{ rag_api_key }}'
  tasks:
  - name: Get a list of documents within a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
      rag_agent_id: '{{ rag_agent_id }}'
      method: LIST
    register: get_result
  - name: Display the list of RAG documents
    debug:
      var: get_result.json_payload
  - name: Get or Retrieve a document by its ID within a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
      rag_agent_id: '{{ rag_agent_id }}'
      rag_document_id: '{{ get_result.json_payload[0].id  }}'
      method: GET_BY_ID
    register: get_by_id_result
  - name: Display the RAG document info
    debug:
      var: get_by_id_result.json_payload
  - name: Upload a document within a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
      rag_agent_id: '{{ rag_agent_id }}'
      rag_file_name: Red_Hat_Partner Training_Portal_User_Guide.pdf
      rag_file_url: http://localhost/pdf/Red_Hat_Partner_Training_Portal_User_Guide.pdf
      rag_chunk_overlap: 150
      rag_chunk_size: 400
      rag_keep_files: false
      method: CREATE
    register: create_result
  - name: Display the output of the document ingestion
    debug:
      var: create_result.json_payload
  - pause:
      prompt: Do you want to continue(yes/no)?
    register: my_pause
    delegate_to: localhost
  - name: Remove or Delete a document by its ID within a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system "888"
output:
ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
  rag_agent_id: '{{ rag_agent_id }}'
  rag_document_id: '{{ create_result.json_payload.id }}'
  method: DELETE
  rag_output_key: '888'
register: delete_result

  method: LIST
  rag_output_key: '2051'
register: get_result

input:
- name: Sample Ansible playbooks to manage documents in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework
  hosts: localhost

      rag_username_api: '{{ rag_username_api }}'
      rag_password_api: '{{ rag_password_api }}'
      rag_api_key: '{{ rag_api_key }}'
  tasks:
  - name: Get a list of documents in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
      rag_agent_id: '{{ rag_agent_id }}'
      method: LIST
    register: get_result
  - name: Display the list of RAG documents
    debug:
      var: get_result.json_payload
  - name: Get or Retrieve a document by its ID in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
      rag_agent_id: '{{ rag_agent_id }}'
      rag_document_id: '{{ get_result.json_payload[0].id  }}'
      method: GET_BY_ID
    register: get_by_id_result
  - name: Display the RAG document info
    debug:
      var: get_by_id_result.json_payload
  - name: Embed a document in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework
    ibm.ce_emea_rag.rag_document:
      rag_agent_id: '{{ rag_agent_id }}'
      rag_file_name: Red_Hat_Partner Training_Portal_User_Guide.pdf
      rag_file_url: http://localhost/pdf/Red_Hat_Partner_Training_Portal_User_Guide.pdf
      rag_chunk_overlap: 300

  - name: Remove or Delete a document by its ID in a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) framework "2054"

  tasks:

  - name: Display the RAG document info
    debug:
      var: get_by_id_result.json_payload
